languages.english-overview:
Tiny Tiny RSS is an open source web-based news feed (RSS/Atom) reader and aggregator, designed to allow you to read news from any location, while feeling as close to a real desktop application as possible.
Tiny Tiny RSS is licensed under GNU GPL.

ul.li: Server-side application, user only needs a web browser
Supports RSS, RDF, Atom feeds using SimplePie
Authentication for reading protected feeds (e.g. LiveJournal friend-only posts)
detecting and filtering duplicate articles, podcasts,
Integration into Desktop Software and Mobile Apps.

languages.english-exp_ad_pass: New password. Leave blank if you do not want to reset the password
languages.english-err_no_username: Please provide the username to reset the password
languages.english-err_no_such_user: The Admin username is incorrect and does not exist!
